data.value: Finding the right size for your t-shirt is important to ensure that you get the perfect fit. Here's a guide to help you choose the right size:

data.value:
Please note that these measurements are approximate and may vary slightly depending on the style and fabric of the t-shirt.

If you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up for a looser fit and sizing down for a more fitted look.If you have any questions about sizing, please feel free to contact us and we'll be happy to assist you.

data.value: With DTG printing, a printer directly applies the ink onto the t-shirt with inkjet technology. It’s sort of like printing on paper, except on a t-shirt. A special printer prints the ink directly onto the garment in the desired design. DTG uses specialty water-based inks, which are absorbed by the fibers of the garment The poly bags used in our packaging are recyclable, low-density polyethylene, FDA and USDA compliant.

data.value:
We take about 2-7 business days to create apparel products (t-shirts etc.) and 2-5 business days for non-apparel (posters etc.) products. Then you should add shipping times on top of that.

97.66% of our orders are shipped within 5 business days. More than a half of our orders are shipped within 3 business days or less.

The poly bags used in our packaging are recyclable, low-density polyethylene, FDA and USDA compliant.
